item.title: Sun Blade 150 Setup and OS Install
item.description: Iâ€™ve had this Sun Blade 150 workstation in my possession for a few months, having gotten it from a friend who was offloading some tech he no longer used nor wanted. Today, I finally decided to get it set up and fully operational. My first attempt at powering this machine on (shortly after I got it) resulted in the monitor coming on for a couple seconds, displaying an error saying there was no keyboard attached, and then shutting off.

item.title: Split Rock Lighthouse, Silver Bay, Minnesota
Judge Magney State Park, Grand Marais, Minnesota
Bexitor
item.description: Bexitor (short for Basic Text Editor) is a simple, fast, lightweight, free, and open-source text editor for Windows, similar to Notepad, except with more features. It works on Windows XP and up (.net Framework 4.0 or newer is required.) I originally wrote Bexitor to learn Visual Basic, but it's turned into more of a continued project, and I would consider it "completed" currently. New versions, however, are released semi-regularly. Bexitor has .

item.title: Files
item.description: Dell Axim X5 Windows Mobile 2003 Upgrade This will upgrade your Dell Axim X5 PDA to Windows Mobile 2003. It can also back up your current software version. I have not been able to find this anywhere else. Download the Dell Axim X5 Windows Mobile 2003 Upgrade HP iPAQ HX2000 Series Windows Mobile 6.5 ROM This is Spiaatie's Windows Mobile 6.5.3 ROM for the HP iPAQ HX2000 series. It works just fine on my HX2795b.

item.title: Software
item.description: Bexitor (short for Basic Text Editor) is a text editor for Windows that I wrote to learn Visual Basic. For more information, screenshots, and downloads, visit Bexitor's website. More About Bexitor

item.title: Wallpapers
item.description: The Ultimate macOS Wallpaper Archive This archive includes every default macOS default wallpaper, in original quality, ripped straight from real Macs. Every wallpaper from Cheetah to Ventura is included. All 3 versions of the default Mojave Desert and Catalina wallpapers are included (day, night, live.) Download The Ultimate OS X Wallpaper Archive (Google Drive) Dell XPS Windows Vista OEM Wallpapers These are all of the default desktop wallpapers included with a Dell XPS computer with Windows Vista, including the Microsoft default ones and some Dell/XPS specific ones.
